SEARCH
Modul CineTrack
Package org.com.controller.cinematics.helper

Klasse CinematicBoxController

java.lang.Object
org.com.controller.cinematics.helper.CinematicBoxController
public class CinematicBoxController extends Object
Controller for displaying a Cinematic box element. Manages the display and organization of Cinematic details such as the title, poster, description, ratings, and other related information. Also handles hover effects to show additional information in the UI.
Version:
1.0
Autor:
umut
Siehe auch:

  • Konstruktordetails

    • CinematicBoxController

      public CinematicBoxController()

  • Methodendetails

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller and sets up hover effects for the box element. This is automatically called when the FXML file is loaded.

    • setupHoverEffects

      private void setupHoverEffects()
      Sets up hover effects for the root pane to control the visibility of the overlay.

    • toggleOverlayVisibility

      private void toggleOverlayVisibility(boolean isVisible)
      Toggles the visibility of the overlay elements (description and overlay) based on the provided isVisible parameter.
      Parameter:
      isVisible - Indicates whether the overlay should be visible or not.

    • setCinematicView

      public void setCinematicView(Cinematic cinematic)
      Sets the information of a Cinematic object into the respective UI elements.
      Parameter:
      cinematic - The Cinematic object whose data is to be displayed.

    • updatePoster

      private void updatePoster(Cinematic cinematic)
      Updates the poster image of the Cinematic in the ImageView.
      Parameter:
      cinematic - The Cinematic object whose poster image is to be displayed.

    • updateLabels

      private void updateLabels(Cinematic cinematic)
      Updates the text labels with the information of the Cinematic object.
      Parameter:
      cinematic - The Cinematic object whose data is used to update the labels.

    • updateLabel

      private void updateLabel(javafx.scene.control.Label label, String text)
      Helper method to update the text of a label.
      Parameter:
      label - The label whose text is to be updated.
      text - The new text to be displayed in the label.

    • updateDescription

      private void updateDescription(Cinematic cinematic)
      Sets the description of the Cinematic in the TextArea element.
      Parameter:
      cinematic - The Cinematic object whose description is to be displayed.
